summary: You came to us with concerns about cough, fever. Based on our assessment, we recommend following the guidance provided below.
recommendations: Consult a doctor if symptoms persist beyond 3-5 days
Stay hydrated and get adequate rest
warning_signs: Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath
when_to_seek_help: Monitor your symptoms. If they persist beyond 3-5 days or worsen, consult a healthcare provider.
